amendment.description: Amendment sought to preserve the Customs Service as a distinct entity within the Department of Homeland Security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 107-615 to preserve the existing Customs Service as a "distinct entity" within the DHS. The amendment does not affect the bill's provisions which protect certain revenue and trade act enforcement functions of the Customs Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardin amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 245 (Roll no. 354).
